concept.title: Granting Parent or Guardian Access to Student Records at NC State University
concept.shortdesc: Discover the process for granting parents or guardians access to your academic and financial records at NC State, ensuring controlled and secure sharing.

conbody.p: Students at NC State can authorize parents or guardians to access their academic and financial records, respecting strict confidentiality policies.

section.title: Available Access Options
section.p: Parents or guardians can be granted access to several types of information:

ul.li: Student Accounts / Billing / Payment: View and manage billing and payment details.
Tax Information: Access to 1098T tax documents.
Academic Information: Includes schedules, grades, transcripts, and transfer credits.
Directory Information: View essential directory details, such as local address and phone number.
Financial Aid: Information on financial aid, awards, and application status.
